products.title: Burst Shark Grey Vertical Blind
products.description: Firm and unyielding, the burst shark grey stands its ground in the window, keeping you safe from peeking eyes and burning sunlight. With such a dark neutral colour, we highly recommend pairing it with a brighter decor, preferably pastel primary colours that add an accent but don't try to beat the rock in a contest of strength, which they would most likely lose. Alternatively, used it to bridge a monochromatic scheme and take the edge out of the white/black contrast.

products.title: Burst Dried Sage Vertical Blind
products.description: The light green colour of the burst dired sage is a beautiful shade, not too overpowering and yet also not too dull in tone. Perfect for kitchens and bathrooms as this fabric is moisture resistant, this fabric will give you the freedom to pair in other colours around this blind, like creams and soft greys. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Burst Yellow Submarine Vertical Blind
products.description: Make a statement in your home with the vibrant yellow colour in the burst yellow submarine. This blind is sure to add some zing to your interior and with a name like yellow submarine youll be singing your way round your home before you know it. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style.

This roller blind is very versatile and can be installed in kitchens, bathrooms and living rooms - brilliant. products.title: Splash Vine Green 89mm Vertical Blind

At swift direct blinds, with fifty years of blind making experiance, quality comes first.
